section.section: The term of a member of the Council is 4 years.
The terms of the members are staggered as required by the terms provided for members of the Council on January 1, 1990.
A member is eligible to serve more than 1 term.

text.section: A member of the Council may not receive compensation, but is entitled to reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations.
The Council shall designate a chairman from among its members.
